job_title: Post-Training Evaluation Engineer – Controls System, Autonomy
job_description:
• Bachelor’s/Master’s/PhD degree in Engineering, Computer Science, Data Science, or a related field, with over 3 years of direct industry experience as a software engineer in robotics, autonomous vehicles, or other real-time, safety-critical environments.
• Experience applying machine learning techniques to evaluate and analyze the performance of controls software in real-world or simulated environments.
• Experience designing, deploying, and maintaining systems with core AWS services (such as S3, EC2, Lambda), and a solid understanding of cloud-native architecture.
• Strong proficiency in modern C++, Python, and experience with ML frameworks, along with experience applying large-scale software engineering best practices.
• Collaborate with algorithm, software, and data engineering teams to define evaluation metrics and reporting requirements.
• Experience with Databricks, SQL, and dashboard development (e.
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with attention to detail.
• Familiarity with automotive control systems and active safety algorithms is a plus.
